amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting the reliability of the electricity grid.

vote.text: Amendment SA 416 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 416 proposed by Senator Capito. (consideration: CR S1964; text: CR S1964) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting the reliability of the electricity grid.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 416 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 416 proposed by Senator Capito.
